uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.list

Class MediaList

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.list.MediaList

  • public class MediaList
extends java.lang.Object
    A media list (i.e. a play-list).

    To do anything more advanced than the functionality provided by this class, the underlying native media list instance is accessible via mediaListInstance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MediaList(LibVlc libvlc, libvlc_instance_t instance)
      Create a new media list.
      MediaList(LibVlc libvlc, libvlc_instance_t instance, libvlc_media_list_t mediaListInstance)
      Create a new media list.

      Insert a media item, with options, to the play-list.

      Test if the play-list is read-only.

    • Method Detail

      • setStandardMediaOptions

        public void setStandardMediaOptions(java.lang.String... standardMediaOptions)
        Set standard media options for all media items subsequently played.

        This will not affect any currently playing media item.

        Parameters:
        standardMediaOptions - options to apply to all subsequently played media items

      • addMedia

        public void addMedia(java.lang.String mrl,
            java.lang.String... mediaOptions)
        Add a media item, with options, to the play-list.
        Parameters:
        mrl - media resource locator
        mediaOptions - zero or more media item options

      • insertMedia

        public void insertMedia(int index,
               java.lang.String mrl,
               java.lang.String... mediaOptions)
        Insert a media item, with options, to the play-list.
        Parameters:
        index - position at which to insert the media item (counting from zero)
        mrl - media resource locator
        mediaOptions - zero or more media item options

      • removeMedia

        public void removeMedia(int index)
        Remove a media item from the play-list.
        Parameters:
        index - item to remove (counting from zero)

      • size

        public int size()
        Get the number of items currently in the list.
        Returns:
        item count

      • isReadOnly

        public boolean isReadOnly()
        Test if the play-list is read-only.
        Returns:
        true if the play-list is currently read-only, otherwise false

      • mrls

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> mrls()
        Get the media resource locators for all of the items in the list.
        Returns:
        list of media resource locators

      • release

        public final void release()
        Clean up media list resources.

      • mrl

        public java.lang.String mrl(libvlc_media_t mediaInstance)
        Get the media resource locator for the given native media instance.

        The media instance must have been added to the list - it must not be any automatically/scripted added sub-item.

        Parameters:
        mediaInstance - native media instance
        Returns:
        media resource locator
